main_page_description: Bepul dasturlash darslari va loyihalari, algoritmlarni mustahkamlash uchun mashqlar. Tayyor shablonlar, shaxsiy profil portfeli va rezyume. JavaScript bilan bog'liq texnologiyalarni o'rganish. SAMMI
course_page_description: Sammi platformasidagi barcha kurslar shunchaki o'rganing va dam oling
books_page_description: Sammi sizga kitoblarni maslahat berishi mumkin
contact_page_description: Sammi bilan bog'laning va siz har qanday savol berishingiz mumkin
pricing_page_description: Sammi akademiyasida darsdan foydalanish va o'qish uchun eng yaxshi paket
faq_page_description: Sammi platformasida ko'proq foydalanuvchilar tez-tez so'raladigan savollar
auth_page_description: Sammi platformasidan foydalanish uchun tizimga kiring yoki hisobingizni yarating
